dict.acceptation: 传送，投递；[法]（正式）交付；分娩；讲演；

sent.orig: There are two methods for the delivery in this contest, namely written delivery and on-line delivery.
sent.trans: 本次大赛作品提交方式主要为书面提交和在线提交两种。

sent.orig: Monitor delivery and remote warehouse inventory to insure customer delivery.
sent.trans: 监控成品发运和异地库存，确保满足客户供货。

sent.orig: Confirm delivery to OE internal, follow material, production schedule, improvement on time delivery rate.
sent.trans: 确定交货期给订单执行，跟进物料，生产计划，提高准时交货率。

sent.orig: Tracing the delivery process to ensure the delivery on time.
sent.trans: 协助销售工程师、跟踪发货进程以确保准时发货。

sent.orig: Input order into SAP system, and print delivery form to warehouse for delivery.
sent.trans: 准确输入客户订单到系统中，并打印送货单据给仓库进行备货和送货。
